title: Bharatendu Kabi rides out of Hero MotoCorp after 20-year stint
description: Bharatendu Kabi, former Communication and CSR Head at Hero MotoCorp, is leaving the company after nearly two decades of service. Hero MotoCorp CEO Niranjan Gupta praised Kabi's strategic guidance, engagements with sports associations, and Corporate Social Responsibility initiatives. Kabi will leave on July 31st, after serving his notice period.
